name: Bulletta Magika
description:
Story

Play as Bulletta, a magical dinosaur girl that can control time thanks to the "Artifact of Many Minutes and a Couple of Hours". If that's not enough, you can shoot your enemies using your normal magic powers.

Game mechanics

Bulletta Magika is a shoot'em'up/bullet-hell game.


Shoot

Bulletta can shoot bubbles in any  direction using her magic rod.

Freeze time

Freeze time stops the movement of enemies and its bullets for a short period of time. Activating it depletes magic.

Rewind time

Rewind time rewinds the movement of enemies' bullets. These rewinded bullets can damage the enemies (and Bulletta too!). When it's active, Bulletta's bubbles deal more damage. Some enemies are only vulnerable when rewind time is active. Activating it depletes magic.
